author: parithosh
content:
Doesn't seem like there's any foul play, atleast on initially looking at logs. All of our nodes are indeed up and on the same fork (irrespective of el or cl). 

I'd say some keys just went offline and need to come back up?

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: Is it intentional nonfinality or something happened?

author: parithosh
content: playing around with forky, there was a slot ~10h ago that was non-canonical but seen as valid by some and invalid by others. No one went on the fork, but could be something?

author: parithosh
content: unintentional, we're trying to see if its just validators who went offline or if its something else.

author: parithosh
content: but in general, https://forky.goerli.ethpandaops.io/ looks fine - we're not seeing more forking than onen would expect in a non-finalized network
